panels.title: General indicators (for all sprints and all bug phases)

targets.query: select count(issueName) from jira_bug group by rootcause

panels.description: Closed bugs (status = 'Done') are considered in the last sprint in which they appear.

targets.query: select count(issueName) from jira_bug WHERE statusCategory = 'Done' group by lastSprint

panels.title: Closed bugs

panels.description: Root causes of all bugs for all sprints of all phases

targets.query: SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug GROUP BY rootcause

panels.title: Root causes

panels.description: Considered the average time worked for all bugs that are 'Done'

targets.query: SELECT mean(bugWorklogTime) FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and statusCategory = 'Done'

panels.title: Time spent on bugs (Avg)

targets.query: SELECT sum(bugWorklogTime) * 100 FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint
select sum(timespent) from jira_hour where sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by sprint
SELECT sum(bugWorklogTime) * 100 FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint
select sum(timespent) from jira_hour where sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by sprint
SELECT sum(bugWorklogTime) * 100 FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint
select sum(timespent) from jira_hour where sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by sprint
SELECT sum(bugWorklogTime) * 100 FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint
select sum(timespent) from jira_hour where sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by sprint
SELECT sum(bugWorklogTime) * 100 FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint
select sum(timespent) from jira_hour where sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by sprint
select mean(deltaTimeToResolveBug) from jira_bug where deltaTimeToResolveBug > 0 and statusCategory = 'Done' and phase =~ /^(${phase:pipe})$/  AND sprint =~ /^(${sprint:pipe})$/ group by sprint
select count(issueName) from jira_bug where deltaTimeToResolveBug = 0 and statusCategory = 'Done' and phase =~ /^(${phase:pipe})$/  AND sprint =~ /^(${sprint:pipe})$/ group by sprint

panels.title: Amount of bugs fixed, but not resolved
Time to resolve bugs (for bug phase and sprint)

targets.query: SELECT mean(bugWorklogTime) FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and phase =~ /^(${phase})$/ and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint
SELECT sum(bugWorklogTime) FROM jira_bug where bugWorklogTime > 0 and phase =~ /^(${phase})$/ and lastSprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ group by lastSprint

panels.title: Worklog on bugs (for bug phase and sprint)

targets.query: SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY phase
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY phase
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY phase
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY phase
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY phase
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY rootcause
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY rootcause
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY rootcause
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY rootcause
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE sprint =~ /^(${sprint})$/ GROUP BY rootcause
SELECT count(issueName) FROM jira_bug WHERE phase = '$phase' AND sprint =~ /^(${sprint:pipe})$/ GROUP BY statusCategory

panels.title: Bug status progress (for bug phase and sprint)

targets.query: SELECT issueName, summary, issueType, category, phase, sprint, lastSprint,  resolutionDate, bugWorklogTime, deltaTimeToResolveBug, rootcause, status, statusCategory from jira_bug

panels.title: Dataset from this dashboard (for all sprints and all bug phases)

list.description: Select sprint(s) to filter dashboard data
list.label: Sprint
list.name: sprint
